page.title: 16SOCIAL SERVICES IN WYDDALL
page.content:
Education in Wyddial
Children are taken by taxi, paid for by the council, to schools outside this block. 5_9year olds to Anstey, 9 and over to Buntingford. Some go to boarding school. There are no schools here.
Law and Order in Wyddial
There is no resident policeman. The roads are patrolled at irregular intervals by police cars. The nearest permanently manned station is about 15 miles away at Bishops Stortford.
Health in Wyddial
No surgeries or clinics are held in Wyddial. The area is served by Buntingford health centre.
